name: Horny Spy: Secret Mission
description:
In Horny Spy: secret mission you will play as a secret service agent - Jessie Smith. She knows 5 languages, have martial art skills, and her charm drives everyone crazy on her way.



Move through the missions to open new scenes and catch the group of gangsters. Meet different and bright characters as the game progresses. And, of course, follow your passion, choosing what is closer to you.



A young but experienced secret agent receives a task to prevent the head of a dangerous mafia. Jessie have to find out information about his location, but it’s not as simple as it seems at first glance. She will have to work undercover, trying on different roles, and also communicate with members of the mafia and more.

Dive into an unforgettable adventure and romantic fantasy with hot and gorgeous Jessie Smith!
